DocAttribute.Name: VisibleSegmentLength
DocAttribute.Documentation:
The length of the visible segment in the pattern definition. > NOTE  For a visible segment representing a point, the value 0. should be assigned.
{ .change-ifc2x3} > IFC2x3 CHANGE  The datatype has been changed to IfcLengthMeasure with upward compatibility for file-based exchange.

DocAttribute.Name: InvisibleSegmentLength
DocAttribute.Documentation: The length of the invisible segment in the pattern definition.

DocWhereRule.Name: VisibleLengthGreaterEqualZero
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The value of a visible pattern length shall be equal or greater then zero.
